SageTVPlugin.Name: "Diamond MKANET Mod" sub-theme
SageTVPlugin.Description: The purpose of this sub-theme is to enhance 'Diamond for Default SageTV7 STV' default graphics by offering a bonus sub-theme called, 'Diamond MKANET Mod'. This sub-theme was originally made to modify Diamond to suit my taste. I prefer 'warmer' color tones and more graphics variety. See screenshots.
SageTVPlugin.Author: mkanet
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.1.3 - Replaced a couple of backgrounds with nicer ones
Version 1.1.2 - Removed Dependency (caused problems installing on extenders)
Version 1.1.1 - Fixed compatibility error message during plugin install
Version 1.1.0 - Refined graphics to accomodate Diamond 3.1 and newer
Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release
